783.Contents:
Storage Area for .P (Status) Register
Bit 0 - Carry
Bit 1 - Zero
Bit 2 - Interrupt Disable
Bit 3 - Decimal
Bit 4 - Break
Bit 5 - Unused
Bit 6 - Overflow
Bit 7 - Negative
